questions.question_text: Vach.Ga.Ma.45 je je mārā kahevāyā chho temā māre ______ kasar rahevā devī nathī.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states that Bhagwan does not want even a sesame seed's worth of deficiency to remain in those who are His own.

questions.question_text: Vach.Ga.Ma.45 Ane māre to je tame Bhagwānnā bhakta chho tenā hrudaymā koī jātnī vāsanā tathā koī jātno ______ te rahevā devo nathī.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states that Bhagwan does not want any kind of desires or inappropriate nature to remain in the hearts of those who are His devotees.

questions.question_text: BHAKTACHINTAMANI 76/39-41 Sukh dukh äve sarve bheļu, temā ______ sthir mati;
questions.explanation: The Bhaktachintamani says to keep your mind steady when सुख and दुख come together.

questions.question_text: BHAKTACHINTAMANI 76/39-41 Em karatā jo pand padashe, to āgaļ sukh chhe ati ghaṇu; Pan vrat tek jo tāļasho to, ______ sahu sahu taṇu.
questions.explanation: The Bhaktachintamani says that if one breaks their vows, they will suffer the consequences.

questions.question_text: BHAKTACHINTAMANI 76/39-41 Nahi to tame nachint rahejyo, karavu tamāre kāī nathī; Je malyā chhe tamane, te pār chhe ______.
questions.explanation: The Bhaktachintamani states that those who have attained Him are beyond Akshar.

questions.question_text: Vach.Ga.An.7 Te Bhagwānno jene pratyaksh pramān dradh āsharo hoy tene manmā evī bīk na rākhavī je, 'Hu rakhe marine ______ thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!'
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut says that one should not fear becoming a ghost after death if they have the support of Bhagwan.

questions.question_text: Vach.Ga.An.7 Evī āshankā manmā rākhavī nahī; kem je, je evo Bhagwānno bhakta hoy te to Bhagwānnā dhāmne ja pāme pan vachmā kyāy tene Bhagwān ______ de nahī.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states that such a devotee of Bhagwan attains Bhagwan's abode and Bhagwan does not allow him to stay anywhere in between.
